name: PolyJump
description:
The game Poly Jump is my first game project that i made for an university exam.

I created the whole game except the audio material. That i have from freesound. Thanks for all the musicians, you are all listed now: 

Cave Atmojulius_gallaWater Cave  Atmo             
KlangkoboldPickup Sound           Mr._FritzPlayer Damage dersuperantonFalling Stones 1 iwanPlaysFalling Stones 2     SetunimanWinning SoundrhodesmasPlayer ShootunfaSlime JumpDrMinkyEnemy ShootV-ktorEnemy Hitvox_artistEnemy Die JofaePlayer Die ClearwavsoundCheckpointDeathscypMenu Sound 
                                          https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-sound-effects-download/video-game-m...

I hope somebody will have fun with this little game and leave a comment. Please don't be to hard on me. :)

Edit: WebGL built coming soon :)
